text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
(I need to finish this document by evening!)

(Expenses...
Have I... cleared them all?!)
Good work!

Oh, Amana.
You're done for the day—

Yes, thank you very much!
This is Amana from 283PRO...
*sigh*

Producer-san...
You seem really busy lately, are you okay?

Huh?
Oh... Yeah, you could say that.

...Just coincidentally,
I have a lot of work piling up.

But it's just for now, so I'll manage.
Thanks.
Is that so...?
Yeah...
...Nutrient meal...

Hm? This one?
It's convenient when you're short on time.

Producer-san,
Will you be working at the office for a while longer?

Yeah,
I'll be here the whole time.

You know, Amana, even if you're busy,
you have to eat properly.

No, I want you to eat.
It's not good for your health if you don't.

So,
let me make something for you!

If it's not too complicated, I can manage,
and eating won't take up too much time, right?
Amana...

Thank you.
Then, can I ask for ginger pork?

! Yeah!
Just that?!
I'd be happy to have miso soup too...

It's totally fine!
Leave it to Amana☆

I'll go buy the ingredients!
I'll be back soon!

...
Alright, let's do this!

Yes!
Thank you for waiting!

Oh, it looks delicious!
Thank you.
Well, let's dig in.
Enjoy your meal.

.... Mmm, it's delicious.
You're really good at this, Amana.
N-No, that's not true...!
No, really, you are.

Thanks to you, I feel energized.
With this, I can keep pushing forward!

If something like this is enough,
I'll make it anytime, just let me know.

But...
I hope you won't push yourself too hard... okay...?
